title: Remote ischemic preconditioning plays a neuroprotective role in cerebral ischemia-reperfusion mice by inhibiting mitophagy
content:
Publication date: 30 October 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 20

Author(s): Jiayi Zhu, Na Xu, Heng Lin, Li Deng, Bingqing Xie, Xiaoqian Jiang, Runde Liao, Chaoxian Yang
